Name: Hot Pickle!
About the game: Hot Pickle! Is a 2D platform jumping game for PC, Mac and Linux. Stephen J. Pickle has just been released from “The Big Pickle” to find his home village in Pickle Country recently raided and his friends, the Lil’ Gherkins, missing. With the advice of Ol’ Crusty P., the village sage, Stephen sets out an adventure through space and thyme to rescue his friends from the evil Burger Boss before they get eaten. Features: - Run, jump, shoot, and dash your way through 10 epic food-themed levels - Battle giant tomatoes and screaming fish - 12 original songs including the hit single “I Am Just a Pickle” by Chris Alarie - Progress through 4 story-driven cutscenes - Spine-tingling special effects!
Meta Title: Hot Pickle!: Jan 13, 2022, Benjamin Stark and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hot Pickle!? Check out the release date (Jan 13, 2022), developer insights from Benjamin Stark, and a complete game summary.
